avatar.container: width: 40px; height: 40px; border-radius: 14px; overflow: hidden; box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(255,182,193,0.25); border: 1px solid #ffb6c180;
avatar.image: object-fit: cover; transition: transform 0.3s ease; filter: brightness(1.05) contrast(1.02);

footer.container: position: absolute; bottom: 0; left: 0; right: 0; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; gap: 14px; padding: 16px; color: #ff8da1; font-size: 13px; border-top: 1px solid #ffb6c140; background: rgba(31,26,29,0.95); backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
footer.text: color: inherit; transition: color 0.2s ease; white-space: nowrap;

emphasis.em: font-style: normal; color: #ff8da1; background: rgba(255,141,161,0.1); padding: 0 4px; border-left: 2px solid #ff8da180;

list.taskList: list-style: none; margin-left: -24px; font-size: 15px; color: #ffd1d9; line-height: 1.8;

code.block: background: #2d2428; padding: 1.2em; border-radius: 14px; font-size: 14px; font-family: 'SF Mono', Menlo, monospace; line-height: 1.6; white-space: pre-wrap; word-wrap: break-word; color: #ffd1d9; margin: 1.5em 0; box-shadow: inset 0 4px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.15), 0 2px 8px rgba(255,182,193,0.1); border: 1px solid #ffb6c180;
code.inline: background: #2d2428; padding: 4px 10px; border-radius: 6px; color: #ffd1d9; font-size: 14px; font-family: 'SF Mono', Menlo, monospace; border: 1px solid #ffb6c180;

styles.quote: border-left: 3px solid #ff8da1; padding: 0 0 0 20px; margin: 1.5em 0; color: #ff8da1; font-style: normal; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.8; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(255,141,161,0.05), transparent);
styles.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; margin: 1.5em auto; border-radius: 14px; box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(255,182,193,0.25); border: 1px solid #ffb6c180;
styles.link: color: #ffb6c1; text-decoration: none; border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,182,193,0.3); transition: all 0.2s ease; text-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(255,182,193,0.1);

table.container: width: 100%; margin: 1.5em 0; border-collapse: separate; border-spacing: 0; border-radius: 14px; overflow: hidden; border: 1px solid #ffb6c180; box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(255,182,193,0.15);
table.header: background: linear-gradient(135deg, #2d2428, #1f1a1d); font-weight: 700; color: #ffb6c1; padding: 14px; border-bottom: 2px solid #ffb6c180;

styles.hr: border: none; border-top: 2px solid #ffb6c180; margin: 32px 0; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(255,182,193,0.15);
